mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.jianyi_uuid_number as jianyiUuidNumber ,a.jianyi_name as jianyiName ,a.jianyi_types as jianyiTypes ,a.jianyi_content as jianyiContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.huifu_text as huifuText ,a.update_time as updateTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,yonghu.new_money as newMoney
FROM jianyi a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.jianyi_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.jianyiUuidNumber},'%')
and a.jianyi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.jianyiName},'%')
and a.jianyi_types = #{params.jianyiTypes}
and a.jianyi_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.jianyiContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.huifu_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.huifuText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeEnd})
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and yonghu.new_money >= #{params.newMoneyStart}
and yonghu.new_money <= #{params.newMoneyEnd}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
